text: Following World War III, all the nations of the world agreed to 50 years of strict isolation from one another in order to prevent additional conflicts. 50 years later, the United States comes out of exile, only to learn that no one else went into isolation.

The United States is now an obsolete superpower. China is has now taken the powers that the United States once had. This makes American pissed. They have now lost their status as number one. Turns out no one really likes China being number one either.

One thing China didn't expect was the US to be so strong even after isolation. All of their military is still in place. The troops have been training.
